title: Trump says talks with Hamas have been ‘very successful, and proceeding rapidly’

author: Tara Suter
description: President Trump on Sunday told Navy sailors not to “worry about” their paychecks that are being held back by the current government shutdown. “As your commander in chief, I will always stand for you. I promise you that,” Trump said at a celebration of the Navy’s 250th anniversary. “You know that, that's why you voted...
title: Trump to sailors on pay held back by shutdown: 'Do not worry about it'
